thread.title: Beyoncé and Blue Ivy, Kim and North, and More of the Best Mommy-and-Me Beauty
thread.title_full: Beyoncé and Blue Ivy, Kim and North, and More of the Best Mommy-and-Me Beauty

title: Beyoncé and Blue Ivy, Kim and North, and More of the Best Mommy-and-Me Beauty
text: Beyoncé and Blue Ivy, Kim and North, and More Epic Mommy-and-Me Beauty Moments Thursday 2, 2017 1:19 AM 1 / 5 Photo: Getty Images Today, Beyoncé took to Instagram to announce that she and husband Jay-Z are expecting twins , and social media subsequently exploded . The excitement is likely due, in part, to Queen B's already perfected displays of mommy-and-me beauty, which she and Blue Ivy have down to an adorable science—who knows what emulatable above-the-neck coordination two babies will bring? Mother/baby matching comes in many forms, presented in welcome abundance by our favorite celebrity moms. When it comes to Blue and Bey, the former's cloud of curls is best paired with her mother's wavy, golden chop. Kim Kardashian West and baby North are known for their generational mane styling —ironed lengths for Kim, on-trend, Mickey Mouse buns for North—with Saint's presence infusing the mix with a bit of boyish raven shine. Blake Lively's daughter, James, has clearly inherited her mother's trademark blonde, though the toddler's texture currently skews curly cute. And while Chrissy Teigen's daughter Luna is likely to grow into mom's down-to-there brunette locks (she makes up for it in headband prowess in the meantime), Angelina Jolie and daughter Shiloh enjoy contrasted coloring that proves passed-down beauty can also be an individual affair. In honor of Beyoncé's new brood, some of our favorite familial beauty moments.
